summary: Two violent young men take a mother, father, and son hostage in their vacation cabin and force them to play sadistic "games" with one another for their own amusement.
cast: Susanne Lothar|Ulrich Mühe|Arno Frisch|Frank Giering|Stefan Clapczynski|Doris Kunstmann|Christoph Bantzer|Wolfgang Glück|Susanne Meneghel|Monika von Zallinger
title: Funny Games
